keyword: how many calories are in a mcdonalds sausage biscuit
title: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Sausage Biscuit?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a McDonald's sausage biscuit—about 430 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Sausage Biscuit?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage Biscuit: pork sausage patty on a buttermilk biscuit, no customizations or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard U.S. menu; check McDonald's app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's sausage biscuit contains 430 calories with 12 g protein and 26 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add one slice of American cheese

faqs.q: How many calories are in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: Approximately 430 calories for one standard sausage biscuit.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: About 12 g of protein per sausage biscuit.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: Around 1130 mg of sodium, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a McDonald's sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: Yes, about 40 g of carbs, mostly from the biscuit.

faqs.q: Does a McDonald's sausage biscuit have trans fat?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in the standard version.
